text: Błażkowa () is a village in the administrative district of Gmina Lubawka, within Kamienna Góra County, Lower Silesian Voivodeship, in south-western Poland. It lies approximately north of Lubawka, south-west of Kamienna Góra, and south-west of the regional capital Wrocław. ==References== Category:Villages in Kamienna Góra County
title: Błażkowa, Lower Silesian Voivodeship
